reviews.name: Microsoft Natural Ergonomic Keyboard 4000
reviews.reviewText: I have used Microsoft ergonomic keyboards for years and my closet is full of discarded ones. The problem is not with the keyboard itself, but the letters on the keyboard are not etched and after a few months the letters fade. I have purchased replacement stickers but after a few weeks they curl off and must be removed. I have now switched to the Logitech keyboard where the letters are etched and do not fade. I cannot understand why Microsoft (after all of the complaints on the Internet) still issues this keyboard with letters that fade because they are not etched on. My LAST Microsoft keyboard was a Microsoft 7000 and most of the letters have faded. Microsoft charges enough for these keyboards but they become junk after a few months.
reviews.title: LETTERS ON KEYBOARD DISAPPEAR

reviews.name: Microsoft Natural Ergonomic Keyboard 4000
reviews.reviewText: Wonderful Ergonomic Keyboard. Can type faster. Much less strain on my wrists.
reviews.title: Ergonomic Keyboard. Can type faster.

reviews.name: Microsoft Natural Ergonomic Keyboard 4000
reviews.reviewText:
I really would have liked to purchase a wireless model Microsoft 7000 keyboard and mouse combo but the price was a little out of range.
The 4000 is wonderful to use. It fits to the hands so nicely and comfortable to use. I like the new style of the number pad with the equal and parenthesis keys above it. If you are looking for a really nice ergonomic keyboard at a reasonable price this is the one to buy.
reviews.title: I wanted to purchase.

reviews.name: Microsoft Natural Ergonomic Keyboard 4000
reviews.reviewText: Love the extra one touch buttons for calculator etc. Feels much more natural than the standard keyboard I was using.
reviews.title: Makes typing and computer work faster and easier.

reviews.name: Microsoft Natural Ergonomic Keyboard 4000
reviews.reviewText: I have used this brand of ergonomic kayboard for many years. I do a lot of typing, and it prevents the wrist pain that I got with normal keyboards. I also liked the free shipping to the WalMart nearest me, and picking it up was easy. I have purchased several products this way and will continue to do so.
reviews.title: This keyboard is great.
